name: System Engineer (Infrastructure) to Georgia|Europe
description:
Responsibilities:

  • Install, configure, maintain and monitor VMWare based data centers and storage systems (Private VMware Cloud).
  • Automate infrastructure in hybrid cloud environment (private and public clouds).
  • Troubleshoot and resolve issues, take part in root cause analysis.
  • Provide reports to management regarding infrastructure utilization.
  • Planning for infrastructure expansion and budget assessment of the cloud segment.

Experience/Qualifications:

  • At least 2 years of experience installing, maintaining and troubleshooting VMWare (Esxi 5/6) implementations with VMs across several Vcenter’s.
  • Intermediate to expert knowledge of Linux and Windows operating systems.
  • Experience in Infrastructure buildout projects in Engineer position.
  • AWS experience (such as setting up VPC, working with EC2, ELB, CLI).
  • At least intermediate level of English (both written and spoken).

Would be a plus:

  • Experience with Cisco UCS stack.
  • Experience with Netapp Storage Systems.
  • Familiarity with VMWare automation tools (vRealize Automation, Orchestrator).

Conditions:

  • Work for foreign company (Georgia), further relocation to Spain or Estonia.
  • Relocation bonus.
  • Well-coordinated professional team.
  • Cutting edge technologies, interesting and challenging tasks, dynamic project, great opportunities for self-realization, professional and career growth.
  • Job placement and payment of salary take place according to the labor code, as well as vacation and sick lists.
  • Corporate training programs, English language courses.
